title: TVS Motor Co joins sustainability initiative UN Global Compact
description: Chennai-based TVS Motor Company on Friday said it has joined the United Nations Global Compact, the world's largest sustainability initiative. With this, the company will now support the 'Ten Principles' of the United Nations Global Compact on human rights, labour, environment and anti-corruption, TVS Motor Company said in a statement.
